productEmsList.title: Charts and Maps
productEmsList.tooltip:
Worldwide basemap: Non-detailed map for general reference.
Garmin Navionics+™: Detailed charts for coastal/inland water and lakes.

productEmsList.title: Sonar
productEmsList.tooltip: Built-in dual channel 1 kW CHIRP, ClearVü and SideVü with Ultra High-Definition option and LiveScope LVS12

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: GPSMAP® 8417 MFD is a chartplotter with a 17-inch full HD display with touchscreen & provides 1-touch setting access for docking, cruising, fishing and anchoring.
seoAttributes.title: GPSMAP® 8417 MFD

seo.ogDescription: GPSMAP® 8417 MFD is a chartplotter with a 17-inch full HD display with touchscreen & provides 1-touch setting access for docking, cruising, fishing and anchoring.
seo.title: GPSMAP® 8417 MFD | Marine Chartplotter | GARMIN

specs.Accepts Data Cards: 2 SD Cards (with Garmin SD card reader accesory)
specs.ClearVü: Yes (with GCV™ black box, sold separately)
specs.Display Size: 14.4" x 9.1"; 17.0" diagonal, 36.6 cm x 23.1 cm; 43.2 cm diagonal
specs.Traditional sonar (dual frequency/beam): Yes (with external black box, sold separately)

inTheBoxTab.content:
• GPSMAP 8417
  • Trim piece snap covers
  • GPS 24xd NMEA 2000 (with pole mount, flush mount and under deck mount adapters)
  • Protective cover
  • Flush mount hardware
  • Power cable
  • NMEA 2000 2 m backbone/drop cable
  • NMEA 2000 6 m backbone cable
  • NMEA 2000 power cable
  • NMEA 2000 T-connector & terminator kit
  • Documentation
